entry.title: How to Connect Google Looker Studio with SAP HANA 2022 On-Premise?
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I’m trying to connect Google Looker Studio with an SAP HANA 2022 on-premise system.

So far, I haven’t found a straightforward connector in Looker Studio that supports direct HANA connections.

If anyone has successfully set this up, could you please share the steps, configuration details, or any required middleware/connectors?

Key questions:

  • What is the recommended method to expose SAP HANA on-premise data to Looker Studio (e.g., JDBC/ODBC, APIs, Data Federation, Cloud Connector, etc.)?
  • Are there any specific network or authentication settings needed?
  • Is there an official or 3rd-party connector that works reliably?

Any guidance, documentation links, or step-by-step procedure would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Implementation and Customizing of Real-Time Instant Payments
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

we are currently analyzing the requirements for introducing real-time Instant Payments. Our system is SAP ERP 6.0 (ECC), and we would like to understand what needs to be done in order to technically support Instant Payments in the SAP payment process.

Could someone please clarify:

  1. Which steps or configuration activities are required to enable Instant Payments in ERP 6.0?

  2. Are there any SAP Notes, guides, or official implementation documents that describe the required setup?

Any guidance, experience, or references would be highly appreciated.

Thank you in advance!

entry.title: VF03 - invoice document search list
entry.content:
Hi,
I have a specific issue with the invoice document search list (VA03). When I enter “900” in the search field, the system shows me a list of invoices like in the screenshot below, with numbers starting with 700 and 300 at the top instead of 900…

Does anyone know why this happens? Is there any option to change this behavior? Any SAP notes? 
We noticed this issue after upgrading from EHP5 to EHP8.


BR,
Tomasz

entry.title: Hello experts, I am working for settlement managements in SAP and I am new to this module.
entry.content:
User reported an issue for the CCS process, when trying to create a settlement (Sales rebate delta accrula document )he is getting the the gross and net amount in Negative values instead of the postive value. 
For ex: 51.005,71- (negative amount) EUR instead of the positive value. 
Could anyone suggest how can check the root cause of the issue and si there any config to validate ?

entry.title: Incorrect Sign orientation for the sales rebates
entry.content:
Hi CCS Experts, 
User reported an issue for the CCS sales rebate, where the SIGN is inverted, like coming NEGATIVE for even an postive case. 
Monthly Accruals and the a bunch of Incoming invoices posted in September and another bunch in October, where for the month end 30.11.2025, the incoming invoices are being considered as the partial settlements. 
This is working fine till October month end and some how the logic got changed. 
How can check with developer, like where exactly I have to check in case of this issue ??

entry.title: EDLI Amount Exceeding ₹75 During Arrear Payroll Calculation
entry.content:
Dear Support team,

We are facing an issue with EDLI calculation during arrear payroll processing. As per statutory requirements, the EDLI contribution must not exceed ₹75, irrespective of whether the calculation is for current month, retro payroll, or non-retro arrears.

However, in our current system behavior:

  • EDLI is correctly capped at ₹75 in the current payroll period.

  • But when arrears are processed, the EDLI amount from arrears payroll is added on top of the current period EDLI.

  • This results in a total EDLI amount exceeding ₹75, which is not compliant.

Example:

  • Current month EDLI = ₹75

  • Arrear EDLI = ₹X (system adds this to current period)

  • Total EDLI > ₹75, which is incorrect.

Expected Behavior:

EDLI must be capped at ₹75 total, regardless of retro or non-retro arrears.
The system should not allow EDLI to exceed ₹75 under any scenario.

Please investigate the EDLI calculation logic in arrear payroll. You can check case trough Variant - MR_EDLI_01 under tcode - PC00_M40_CALC.

Thanks & Regards

Mrityunjoy

thanks

best regards

Thank you

entry.title: Stock Values Showing Zero Post Stock Adjustment
entry.content:
Stock adjusted items off and on due to the original materials having an incorrect finish, therefore we had to change the products to a new material number and material finish.

The original PO was raised against the incorrect finish, the PO is closed and the invoice to the supplier has been paid, therefore we are unable to reverse. 

Since adjusting the correctly labelled materials into stock, the value is now showing (as these products are not linked to a PO, so effectively not purchased).

How do we process this stock to show the correct value?

entry.title: Adding additional columns in WLF_IDOC ALV List
entry.content:
We have a requirement where we need to add additional columns( for example, column material number) to the ALV List that comes in the second screen of Tcode WLF_IDOC. These columns need to be filled by data from segments( for example, 'ZMaterial' from segment) of the IDOC, and if a certain segment does not exist we keep it blank.

I have found a Enhancement Spot 'WLF_IDOC_PROCESSING' .  I found the below BADI with the description can be used to change fields in ALV LIST. 

I tried implementing the above BADI but it is not getting triggered. I made it the default implementation but still the implementation is not getting called. 

I need to add the columns and then fill the field with the values. 

Can  somebody please suggest a solution ?

ABAP Development  SAP enhancement package for SAP ERP SAP enhancement package for SAP ERP, version for SAP HANA SAP ERP

entry.title: Is it possible to change the Date in field BKPF-BLDAT in Accounting Document.
entry.content:
I want to change the date in Document Date Field BKPF-BLDAT.  ACCHD Structure is used to pass data to BKPF But in ACCHD structure the BLDAT is not present. So, is it possible to modify the date using some exit or enhancement?
Tcode: VF01/VF02/VF03.

entry.title: Do we need to scheudle a job for report PPH_MRP_SET_CACHE to update shortages in Fiori Apps?
entry.content:
Dear Gurus,

While setting up MRP and the most relevant Fiori apps, I have come across an issue related to some Fiori apps (Monitor External Requirements, Manage External Requirements...).

After checking SAP note 3603703, I decided to run report PPH_MRP_SET_CACHE and update entries and I got the Fiori apps showing the correct data.

However, I wanted to know if this was actually something we would need to schedule in the background? I was expecting the information to be fully synch in Fiori with S4HANA. Is it not the case or might have be missing some configurations or activations?

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: MRP Not Converting Demand from Old to New Materials in BOM with Dependent Parallel Discontinuation
entry.content:
Issue: MRP is creating negative requirements on discontinued components instead of converting demand to follow-up materials in a phantom BOM structure.

Setup:

  • Phantom BOM with components A, B, C converting to X, Y, Z
  • Using ECN with dependent parallel configuration via follow-up groups
  • BOM structure:
    • Line item 0021 (FolGp 01): Component A (old) + Component X (new)
    • Line item 0022 (FolGp 01): Component B (old) + Component Y (new)
    • Line item 0023 (FolGp 01): Component C (old) + Component Z (new)
    • All items valid from 10/28/2025
    • Is this perhaps because I have duplicated line items, one with old, one with new? See picture for better BOM setup.

 

 

Material Master Settings:

  • Component A: Disc indicator 1, follow-up material = X
  • Components B & C: Disc indicator 3, no follow-up in material master
  • Follow-up groups configured in BOM discontinuation data (DisGp 01 → FolGp 01)

Problem: When MRP runs and stock depletes on old components, it continues generating negative requirements on A/B/C instead of converting demand to X/Y/Z. Tested with temporary production order and it appeared to work, but actual MRP run doesn't convert, as shown from MD04 transaction on component A. It does appear that the effective out date is considered. It even generated one PO for January '26 for 30pcs.

 

Question: Is there something specific about how MRP handles discontinuation with phantom BOMs? Do I need different effectivity dates on old vs new components, or is there a configuration issue with how the follow-up groups are set up?

Any help appreciated - this is blocking our component transition.

entry.title: Transformation from DTAZV to pain 001.001.09 New EBS Formats
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m working on replacing the old DTAZV format with pain.001.001.09 in our SAP ECC (R/3) system.
The pain.001.001.09 format is already implemented and works correctly in other payment scenarios(In F110) and this was done by following 2253571 SAP Note, but for this specific case( Auslandsüberweisung ) the generated EBS is not valid according to the bank requirements.

I am aware of SAP Note 3187339, but since we are on an ECC/R3 system, the note is not applicable to our release.

My question is:

Does this mean that on R/3 the transformation from DTAZV to pain.001.001.09 must be manually adjusted (DMEE/customizing), or is there any SAP-delivered configuration for this format that I might be missing?

If anyone has experience with this transition on ECC, I would appreciate any guidance or best practices.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Inspection lots with blocked UD assignment
entry.content:
Dear QM Specialist,
I'm having a problem with Inspection Lots: I can't assign a Decision Unit (DU) to close them. I need to close about 80,000 inspection lots, but they all have a specific item missing, for example, "Missing Confirmation Certificate". Is it possible to remove this requirement from the inspection lot and assign the DU to it, given that the item has already been released, leaving only the blocked inspection lot?

entry.title: Customer Return(A2X) API and In-House Repair API Combination of any another API is available?
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Overview | Customer Return (A2X) | SAP Business Accelerator Hub 

Try Out | In-House Repair | SAP Business Accelerator Hub

Regards,

Srini.

entry.title: Help on RA Costs on GR55
entry.content:
I want a column in GR55 that shows RA cost

For example, looking at V.006010 the RA costs is 572,601.05, but on GR55
there is no cost recorded (See both screenshots attached). Where does
the value come from on CJE0 and why is it not coming through on GR55?
